mapper.select: select a.ddname,a.amount, a.f0, a.cal, a.carb, a.prot, a.fat, a.dddo, trunc(a.ddate) as ddate, to_char(a.ddate, 'day') as dday, b.ucon from diary_detail a, diary b where TO_CHAR(a.ddate,'iw') =TO_CHAr(to_date(sysdate,'yy-MM-dd'),'iw') and a.mid = b.mid and TRUNC(a.ddate) = trunc(b.ddate) order by a.ddate

select trunc(a.ddate) as ddate, a.mid, b.mid, sum(b.cal) as sumcal, to_char(a.ddate, 'day') as dday from diary a,diary_detail b WHERE a.mid = 'user3' AND a.mid = b.mid and trunc(a.ddate)=trunc(b.ddate) and TO_CHAR(a.ddate,'iw') =TO_CHAr(to_date(sysdate,'yy-MM-dd'),'iw') GROUP BY a.ddate, a.mid, b.mid order by ddate

select a.ddname,a.amount, a.f0, a.cal, a.carb, a.prot, a.fat, a.dddo, trunc(a.ddate) as ddate, to_char(a.ddate, 'day') as dday, b.ucon from diary_detail a, diary b where TO_CHAR(a.ddate,'iw') =TO_CHAr(to_date(sysdate,'yy-MM-dd'),'iw') and a.mid = b.mid and TRUNC(a.ddate) = trunc(b.ddate) and trunc(sysdate)=TRUNC(a.ddate) order by a.ddate
